data.event: Pleasanton is a city in Alameda County, California, incorporated in 1894.
In 2005 and 2007, Pleasanton was ranked the wealthiest middle-sized city in the United States by the Census Bureau.

event.title: is held during the last week

data.event: The Alameda County Fairgrounds are located in Pleasanton where the county fair is held during the last week of June and the first week of July.

event.title: is reported being number 4 by "USA Today

data.event: Pleasanton is reported being number 4 by "USA Today" in "America's 50 best cities to live in" in 2014, number 63 in Money's list of "The Best Places to Live" in 2010, and was also named one of "Americans' Top Hometown Spots" in the United States in 2009 by Forbes.
